title: Hip Kids Play Playground at Forum The Shopping Mall
blurb: Enjoy boundless fun in our Hip Kids Play playground!
description: Hip Kids Play playground offers a fun and safe environment for young children to explore and play. With slides and other engaging features, children can enjoy a new adventure with every visit. The playground is designed for children ages seven and below and below the height of 120cm, ensuring a safe and enjoyable experience for all. Parents can relax knowing their children are in a secure and entertaining environment. Just pop by the Information Counter located on Level 2 during mall hours from 10am to 8pm to sign up!
